_comment: This file contains all the content for the portfolio website.

hero._comment: Hero section with the typed text.

about.title: About Me
about.text: A passionate and proficient Software Engineer and HTML Developer with a strong foundation in front-end technologies, including HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. As a Front End Developer and UI Developer, I specialize in creating responsive, accessible, and optimized web applications. With expertise in Figma to HTML, PSD to HTML, and AI to HTML conversions, I excel at transforming design requirements into high-quality, user-friendly interfaces. My experience includes implementing email marketing campaigns and ensuring ADA compliance. I am familiar with modern tools and frameworks like Figma, jQuery, and Mailchimp, and I leverage Version Control with Git for efficient collaboration. I am always eager to learn and adapt to new technologies to drive innovation and efficiency.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.skills_summary: With a strong foundation in front-end technologies, I am proficient in HTML, CSS, Scss, and Bootstrap, and have experience with JavaScript and jQuery. I am also adept at Figma to HTML conversions, ensuring web accessibility through ADA compliance, and delivering scalable and maintainable code for cross-browser compatibility.

services.title: Services I Offer
services.services_summary: I offer a range of services including developing and maintaining responsive and accessible web pages, creating and managing web page templates, and implementing and testing email campaigns. I am a collaborative team player who can work with designers and developers to deliver high-quality web applications.

items.title: Web Development
items.text: Building responsive and high-quality websites and web applications using modern technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap.

items.title: UI/UX Implementation
items.text: Transforming Figma and PSD designs into pixel-perfect, interactive, and user-friendly web interfaces, including Figma to HTML.

items.title: Email Marketing
items.text: Creating and testing responsive email templates for marketing campaigns using tools like Litmus and Mailchimp.

items.title: Accessibility (ADA Compliance)
items.text: Ensuring websites are accessible to people with disabilities by following the ADA and WCAG standards.

items.title: Figma to HTML Conversion
items.text: Converting Figma designs into clean, semantic, and responsive HTML and CSS code.

items.title: Responsive Design
items.text: Building websites that work seamlessly across all devices and screen sizes, from desktops to mobile phones.

items.title: Website Optimization
items.text: Improving website performance, speed optimization, and user experience through code optimization and best practices.

items.title: Version Control with Git
items.text: Managing and tracking code changes effectively using Git and GitHub for collaborative projects.

items.title: PSD to HTML Conversion
items.text: Converting Photoshop designs into clean, semantic, and responsive HTML and CSS code.

items.title: AI to HTML Conversion
items.text: Converting Adobe Illustrator designs into clean, semantic, and responsive HTML and CSS code.

experience.title: Experience
experience.summary: With a solid background as an HTML Developer, Front End Developer, and UI Developer, I have a proven track record of developing and maintaining web pages and applications. My experience spanned across various companies, where I honed my skills in front-end technologies. I collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, including React, WordPress, and Shopify developers, providing high-quality HTML and SCSS to build modern and responsive websites.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Contributed to building responsive and user-friendly web applications using React.js, JavaScript, HTML, CSS (Flexbox, Bootstrap) and modern development practices.
Was responsible for developing reusable UI components.
Optimized website performance.
Ensured SEO-friendly structures.
Collaborated with the team to implement JSON-based APIs.
Used version control with GitHub.
Delivered projects with a focus on responsive web design for both desktop and mobile.
Enhanced overall user experience.
Improved project efficiency through clean, maintainable code.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Developed, tested, and maintained HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and Javascript for web pages and web applications.
Collaborated with designers, developers, and other stakeholders to understand project requirements and deliverables.
Ensured that web pages and web applications were responsive, accessible, and optimized for different browsers and devices, including adhering to ADA Compliance Standards.
Created and managed web page templates, layout designs, and user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks.
Implemented and tested email campaigns using tools like Litmus and Mailchimp to ensure cross-platform compatibility and adherence to industry standards.
Kept up-to-date with industry trends, best practices, and new technologies to improve code quality and efficiency.
Performed code reviews, debugging, and troubleshooting to identify and fix errors and performance issues in web pages, email templates, or applications.

jobs.title: HTML Developer
responsibilities: Developed and maintained HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for various web projects.
Contributed to projects like Byzfunder, ThePhix, Gloria Agency, Green Light Finance, and Taxi Transfer.

jobs.title: HTML Developer
responsibilities: Developed and maintained HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for various web projects.
Contributed to projects like Lift Learning, Speki, and Naylor.

projects.title: Projects
projects.projects_summary: Throughout my career, I have had the opportunity to work on a variety of web development projects, ranging from e-commerce platforms to informational websites and lead generation tools. These projects have allowed me to hone my skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and have given me experience in building and deploying high-quality web applications that deliver tangible results. You can see some of my work below.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.contact_summary: I am always open to new opportunities and collaborations. If you have a project in mind or would like to connect, please feel free to reach out to me. I look forward to hearing from you.
